member.name: T:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerOperationAttribute
member.summary: Enriches Operation metadata for a given action method

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerOperationAttribute.Summary
member.summary: A short summary of what the operation does. For maximum readability in the swagger-ui, this field SHOULD be less than 120 characters.

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerOperationAttribute.Description
member.summary: A verbose explanation of the operation behavior. GFM syntax can be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerOperationAttribute.OperationId
member.summary: Unique string used to identify the operation. The id MUST be unique among all operations described in the API. Tools and libraries MAY use the operationId to uniquely identify an operation, therefore, it is recommended to follow common programming naming conventions.

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerOperationAttribute.Tags
member.summary: A list of tags for API documentation control. Tags can be used for logical grouping of operations by resources or any other qualifier.

member.name: T:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerParameterAttribute
member.summary: Enriches Parameter metadata for a given top-level parameter

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerParameterAttribute.Description
member.summary: A brief description of the parameter. This could contain examples of use. GFM syntax can be used for rich text representation

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerParameterAttribute.Required
member.summary: Determines whether this parameter is mandatory. If the parameter is in "path", it will be required by default as Swagger does not allow optional path parameters

member.name: T:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerResponseAttribute
member.summary: Adds or enriches Response metadata for a given action method

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerResponseAttribute.Description
member.summary: A short description of the response. GFM syntax can be used for rich text representation.

member.name: T:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerTagAttribute
member.summary: Adds Tag metadata for a given controller (i.e. the controller name tag)
member.remarks: Don't use this attribute if you're tagging Operations with something other than controller name e.g. if you're customizing the tagging behavior with TagActionsBy.

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerTagAttribute.Description
member.summary: A short description for the tag. GFM syntax can be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Annotations.SwaggerTagAttribute.ExternalDocsUrl
member.summary: A URL for additional external documentation. Value MUST be in the format of a URL.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.AnnotationsSwaggerGenOptionsExtensions.EnableAnnotations(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,System.Boolean)
member.param: Enables polymorphic schemas based on the presence of SwaggerSubTypeAttribute on base types
